151.content:
"How can she be alive ...?"
"Her skin is all burnt ..."

....

15111.content:
Sonic approached the doctor.
Sonic: I'll go.
Doctor : I should warn you, she is a little ... stressed.
Sonic: Amy? Stressed?
Doctor: Just be ...
Sonic: Hey, do not be like this, I just want to see it ...
The Doctor opens the door, Sonic enters and closes the door, he turns and sees Amy lying with her back to him.

Amy did not want anyone look at it that way.
Sonic: Amy? Answer.
Amy: Go away ...
Sonic: Amy, that's not how it solves.
Amy: Just leave me alone.
Sonic: I'm your friend, do not be afraid or ashamed of me.
Amy turns, with the blanket covering her body.
Amy: Look at me! I almost do not fit in this room.

Amy: I do not know how it happened ... i just ... wake up like this ...
Sonic: You need not be this way.
Amy: I've heard some scientists saying that maybe I'm still growing ... It gives me chills, the fact that soon I'll get bigger than the hospital.

151111.content:
The following hours were not very "comfortable" to Amy, the medical examinations do not stop it, and besides that, but nobody was giving answers.
Amy: Hey! Can you explain how I got this size?
Doctor: Ahh, well, umm, look, i, im busy now ...!
Amy: ... WAIT! Damn ...
Some hours later ...
Amy was lie down, looked at the ceiling, thinking. When Tails enters the room.
Tails: Amy.
Amy wakes up and hits her head on the ceiling.
Amy: AUU. That hurt.
Tails: Amy, I just came to see how you are.
Amy: Taking the simple fact that the world is shrinking around me, I'm fine ... And also I was not hitting the ceiling, and now I'm ... I'm still growing.
Tails: I and other scientists are researching a cure.
Amy: Tails, I want explanations.
Tails: What kind of explanation?
Amy: Maybe some, like: "How am I not dead?" "Who threw that bomb?"
Tails: There is a theory: When the radiation reached you, she has changed your body in a way that is making you grow ...
Amy: Wait, I heard that very large people have health problems ...
Tails: This is another strange thing, the radiation did your body go into a mode of adaptation, that is, your body will follow the changes smoothly.
Tails: Strange as it may seem, it was not he this time.
Amy: Then who did?
Tails: The authorities are trying to discover who it was.
Amy: And what about me? I say, what I'm going to eat? What will I wear?
Tails: Well, it's being provided.
Amy: And this room? I mean, I'm growing, soon I will not fit here.
Tails: That I do not know the answer, but I'll ask.
Amy: I'm afraid ...
Tails: What?
Amy: Of me, soon you will all dolls look compared to me.
Tails: But fear of what?
Amy: That I may inadvertently crush anyone ...
Tails: Amy, do not need to be so.
Amy: Ok, ok.
Tails leaves the room, Amy lies on the bed, and is trying to think and who could have done it.
151111.title: Continue

1511111.content:
Amy feels like a circus freak, but she soon falls asleep.
....
....
Amy slowly awakens, she tries to get up but hits the ceiling again, she had grown more.
Amy: Oh God, I can not get over this room. I gotta get out!
Amy squeezes into the room and faces the wall. It would overturn it, and would not care what others would say. She raises her fist and slams it on the wall, an outlet, she squeezes her and finally gets up and realizes how she grew up. The hospital is only a few feet bigger than her.
1511111.title: Continue

info.brief_description: One Day,amy will Have the experience very BIG, how and why?You decided what will happen.
info.description:
Hello and welcome to my first story on writing.com,in this interactive story,amy will grow,and YOU decides will happen.Enjoy.

PS: Only Amy grow, growth slow ... ok, ok, ok, if you like to grow fast, can for, no nudity (Amy's clothes do not grow with her, but she has to improvise something to wear, use your imagination)no sex,nothing gay and one last thing,Amy can not be evil. I love a good history.Enjoy (2)

Warning:Who add will take 125 gif ponts!!!(for the first 3 weeks,so,be quick!).
